Package ui.game

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.drawing.DrawableSection
      • ui.input.selection.DrawableSelectableSection
        • ui.input.selection.SelectableGrid<SelectableBufferedSection,​BufferedSectionComposer<SelectableBufferedSection>,​SelectableBufferedSection>
          • ui.game.GameBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrintHandler, Section, SelectableSection, SelectionHandler
    public class GameBoard
extends SelectableGrid<SelectableBufferedSection,​BufferedSectionComposer<SelectableBufferedSection>,​SelectableBufferedSection>
    Represents the game board.
    A selectable grid of sections built upon a SectionGrid. Sections can be moved between using the movement keys.
    Represents a selectable section that can be drawn to the terminal window.
    Represents a section that can be drawn to the terminal window.

      Represents a section that can be drawn to the terminal window.

                 TerminalHandler terminalHandler,
                 EscapeHandler escapeHandler,
                 boolean enabled)
        Constructor for GameBoard.
        Parameters:
        game - The game the board belongs to.
        terminalHandler - The TerminalHandler.
        escapeHandler - The escape handler.
        enabled - Boolean; true if the game board is enabled for selection.

    • Method Detail

      • getGrid

        private static SectionGrid<SelectableBufferedSection,​BufferedSectionComposer<SelectableBufferedSection>,​SelectableBufferedSection> getGrid​(Game game)
        Gets the underlying section grid for the board. Add the promotion indicators to the top of the board then add the pieces.
        Parameters:
        game - The game the board will belong to.
        Returns:
        The section grid.

      • updateBoard

        public void updateBoard​(java.util.Map<Game.Coord,​Piece> boardState,
                        java.util.Set<Game.Coord> enabled,
                        boolean flip)
        Updates the board to reflect the game board. Enables pieces that should be selectable.
        Parameters:
        boardState - The game board.
        enabled - A set of enabled coordinates.
        flip - True if player 2 is at the bottom of the board.

      • getFlippedCoord

        private Game.Coord getFlippedCoord​(int row,
                                   int col)
        Gets the coordinate, flipped if flipped is set to true.
        Parameters:
        row - The y coordinate.
        col - The x coordinate.
        Returns:
        A Coord object with the appropriate coordinate.
